data.message: Eminem not afraid backwards- I miss my family can't live with things I lost/ the more I lie the windyness/My open arms the devil fell/ my Hearts Still Good i thank you once again/ I'm Capable yeah I'm Capable/ Hey i'm your Friend, Hey i'm your friend/ It hurts again it hurts again. Dont take them seriously... you mustn't... See what I had to go through?... Ah I ran into the... (You're Fine, you're fine!)
